commentText: If we're running within an ApplicationContext, don't schedule the tasks_right here_ wait for this context's ContextRefreshedEvent instead.
codeText: @Override_	public void afterPropertiesSet() {_		if (this.applicationContext == null) {_			scheduleTasks()__		}_	}
